mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (EMAIL, PASSWD, USERNAME, NICKNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, PHONE, REFUNDBANK, REFUNDACCOUNT) VALUES (#{emailId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{phone}, #{refundBank}, #{refundAccount})
mapper.select: SELECT orderId, cardBank, cardNo, validDate, cvc, address1, address2, address3, phone, refundBank, refundAccount, totalPrice, orderDate, userId FROM orders WHERE userId = #{userId}
